item.title: Re: cheat for getting vanilla
item.content:encoded:
Trying to clear this up for our anon fri—well, at least, for the OP.

Just as with items and events, allies are tied to single ( or, in the case of some D-rank allies, 2-3 total ) missions. Completing these missions gives a chance to get the ally if they're regular missions, and guarentee that you get the ally if it's a special mission.

Monochrome Pheromone states that if there is a Reaper ally in the next regular mission that you attempt, you will find them if you pass the mission. This means that if the mission you use it for does not have an ally hidden, or you already have the ally hidden at that mission, then the Monochrome Pheromone will simply be wasted. Consider it comparable to using the Lucky Sevens theme - it grants no bonus under the above conditions, but will guarentee that you will find the ally if you pass the mission they're hidden in.

To reiterate the last poster said: Vanilla is only obtainable through the Ice Ice special mission.
